title: Don McGahn Defies Congressional Subpoena for Mueller-Related Documents
summary: Former White House Counsel Donald McGahn, at White House instruction, refuses to provide documents to House Judiciary Committee related to Russia investigation and potential obstruction of justice. McGahn was a critical witness to alleged obstruction instances described in Mueller report, making his defiance a key component of systematic obstruction strategy.

sources.title: Ex-White House lawyer Don McGahn defies House subpoena for Mueller docs
